Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 53rd overall pick, by St. Louis in 1968...
Injured on 6/18/1970 with a Bruised Hand, out for 3 days...
Injured on 8/25/1970 with a Inflamed Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 7 weeks...
Injured on 4/18/1972 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Traded from St. Louis to Cleveland on 6/12/1972 (Going to STL: P M. Proly. Going to CLE: LF J. Kennedy, 3B M. Trillo)...
Injured on 7/24/1972 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 3 days...
Had first career hit on 8/11/1972, off Chuck Estrada (DET)...
Injured on 8/30/1972 with a Broken Ribs, out for 3 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 2/2/1978 to a 4-year deal worth $4,400,000 per year...
